item.title: HSCTF 2019 Writeup: Reversal
item.description: A Byte Problem Written by: ItzSomebody Just one byte makes all the difference. a-byte Solution Looking at the code, we see that the flag has a length of 35: if ( (unsigned int)strlen(argv[1]) != 35 ) goto LABEL_11; ... LABEL_11: puts("u do not know da wae"); result = 0xFFFFFFFFLL; If the length is correct, the user input will be xored with 1 and then compared with a string loaded on the stack.
